summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Web X Media agency website. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend pages load correctly with navigation working, but has React development issues causing console errors.

development_issues.issue: Missing 'key' prop for list items in render method
development_issues.error_message: Each child in a list should have a unique 'key' prop

development_issues.issue: Maximum update depth exceeded in useEffect
development_issues.error_message: Maximum update depth exceeded. This can happen when a component calls setState inside useEffect, but useEffect either doesn't have a dependency array, or one of the dependencies changes on every render
development_issues.impact: Infinite re-render loop causing performance issues and console spam

passed_tests: Stripe checkout session creation (Bronze, Silver, Gold, Custom plans)
Home page loads with hero section and animations
Services page displays pricing plans correctly
About Us page shows company information
Contact page with form submission working
Checkout page loads and displays order summary
All pricing plan buttons are clickable
Contact form successfully submits and shows success message
Google Maps integration on contact page

high_priority: Fix infinite re-render loop in Checkout.js useEffect - likely caused by missing dependency array or changing dependencies
medium_priority: Add unique 'key' props to list items in Home.js component to eliminate React warnings
low_priority: Consider adding loading states for better UX during API calls
Add error boundaries for better error handling
